Battlefist Smash.name: Battlefist Smash
Battlefist Smash.flavor: Channeling arcane power into your battlefist, you smash it into your enemy with such force that you leave your foe staggering.
Battlefist Smash.requirement: Your battlefist hand must be free.
Battlefist Smash.onHit: 3[W] + Intelligence modifier damage, and you push the target a number of squares equal to your Constitution modifier. The target grants combat advantage to you and your allies until the start of your next turn.

Self-Repair.name: Self-Repair
Self-Repair.flavor: Your magic quickly repairs your damaged components.
Self-Repair.effect: You regain hit points equal to twice your healing surge value.

Flailing Gauntlet.name: Flailing Gauntlet
Flailing Gauntlet.flavor: Your metal hand detaches from your arm and shoots toward a foe, remaining connected to you by a chain of force.
Flailing Gauntlet.requirement: Your battlefist hand must be free.
Flailing Gauntlet.onHit: 4[W] + Intelligence modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.
Flailing Gauntlet.effect: Your battlefist gains the reach weapon property until the end of the encounter.
